title: Why The Fuck Are There So Many Roles

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: You'll receive a pool of 5 roles, 3 are in the game and 2 are not. You are only able to kill players with roles in your pool. Nothing happens if you target a role not in your pool - your ability will simply fail. Once all roles in the pool are dead, you'll get a new one.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Roles of players that are dead can show up as a "not in the game" role, but not as an "in the game" role. Roles that don't exist in the game can show up multiple times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: NK goal and also spite noodle for stealing slot 500
